price: ចូរពួកអ្នកធ្វើដំណើរទៅកាន់ចំការរបស់ពួកអ្នកចុះ ប្រសិន បើពួកអ្នកចង់ប្រមូលផលនោះ។
arabic: أَنِ ٱغۡدُواْ عَلَىٰ حَرۡثِكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰرِمِينَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: ani igh'dū ʿalā ḥarthikum in kuntum ṣārimīna
